data.title: Radio & Television Services
data.text:
Upcoming Events

The SUMMER just got HOT!

Tune in to WRVS 89.9 all summer long for your chance to win tickets.

Register here for Musiq Soulchild and Eric Benet.

DONATE TODAY.

About WRVS 89.9 and W18BB-DTV

Elizabeth City State University is the home of both a radio station (WRVS-FM) and television station (W18BB-DTV). WRVS-FM is the listener-supported, 41,000-watt powerhouse, public radio service of ECSU. WRVS has served northeastern North Carolina and Hampton Roads with NPR news, sports, gospel, jazz and urban music for over 38 years. W18BB-DTV is Elizabeth City State University's low power digital television (LP-DTV) station carried on closed-circuit Channel 18 on the campus of ECSU and broadcasted on Spectrum Cable Channel 20.

Get yourself with our professional video production services! We have all thought about how well we could tell our story in our own words with our own visuals. W18BB-TV can help you do just that. W18BB houses a D-TV studio and master control operation. Our services include videography, post-production, station tours, consultations, and more.
